info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:50PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN HARRISON...JEFFERSON... SOUTH CENTRAL COLUMBIANA...SOUTHEASTERN CARROLL...NORTHEASTERN BELMONT...OHIO AND BROOKE COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 249 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Carrollton to near Cadiz. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Steubenville, Cadiz, West Liberty, Wintersville, Tiltonsville, Salineville, Yorkville, Hopedale, Flushing, Smithfield, Scio, and Adena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
